column2:
The source language code of the word list. 
Supported language code, generally consisting of its ISO 639-1 identifier. (E.g. 'en', 'ja'). 
In certain cases, BCP-47 codes including language + region identifiers are returned (e.g. 'zh-TW' and 'zh-CH')

The target language code for the results. 
Supported language code, generally consisting of its ISO 639-1 identifier. (E.g. 'en', 'ja'). 
In certain cases, BCP-47 codes including language + region identifiers can be used (e.g. 'zh-TW' and 'zh-CH')

The Microsoft API Translator key. 
For more information, read this 
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/translator/translator-info-overview

Path to word list file in CSV format. Words should be listed once per line. 
CSV file columns 
Origin,Category

Path to output result file in Excel format.   
Excel file columns are Word,Category,GoogleTranslation,BingTranslation
